name: Geometry Hat
description:
Geometry Hats are fun, design-intelligent items meant to appeal to all people who love hats. Additionally, Geometry Hats are a great way to help kids who struggle with math find an easy, tactile way to engage in learning via play.



Please visit our free resource site -  http://twiggypopranchacademy.wordpress.com/
  - the nucleus of information and activities based on Geometry Hats. Stop by any time for inspiration....
 
Geometry Hats are a Copyright of Twiggypop Ranch. All rights reserved.

name: Geometry Hats Activity Booklet
description: Our Geometry Hats Activity Booklet is a fantastic supplement to your Geometry Hats. It is full of 30+ unique and fun to do activities that will make you laugh, think actively and engage your hat. Activity suggestions are generally for people of all ages and most can be accomplished just about anywhere, with minimal material requirements. We like math here at Twiggypop Ranch and the activities we are sharing with you in this booklet provide a great way to do and learn about math without necessarily feeling like you are in fact "doing math".
